item.title: Building a career
item.description: Intro It’s heartbreaking to see people I care about, people with whom I’ve spent good moments, people that are way smarter than I am - struggling with building a career. I’m not someone who has it all figured out either but I know what helped me. It bothers me what I’m about to share isn’t common knowledge and there are people who exploit this lack of information. This is roughly the advice I’ve followed or realised over the years.
